title: The Ultimate Frank Lloyd Wright (MAC)
creator_credit: Microsoft Corporation, Byron Preiss and Jeff Hixson
brief_description: A stimulating history of Wright’s influential architectural design which gives you insight to his genius as well as an understanding of the influence his architecture has had on subsequent generations of architects. The program allows you to design your own buildings and gain an understanding of the architectural process. SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS: Any Macintosh computer that supports a 256 colour, 640 x 480 or higher resolution monitor; System 7 or later; 2MB available hard-disk space.
